channel.title: Comments on: Railo 3.1 – liking it so far
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: Ryan Stille
item.dc:creator: Ryan Stille
item.description: I&apos;ve never used vspider, so don&apos;t know much about it, but I haven&apos;t seen any type of http-based crawler in Railo or BD.  I do remember seeing how you could index a directory of documents from within the administrator, but nothing about crawling using http.
item.content:encoded: I've never used vspider, so don't know much about it, but I haven't seen any type of http-based crawler in Railo or BD.  I do remember seeing how you could index a directory of documents from within the administrator, but nothing about crawling using http.

item.title: By: Adrian Lynch
item.dc:creator: Adrian Lynch
item.description: Do you know if there is anything comparable to vspider in Lucene/Railo?
item.content:encoded: Do you know if there is anything comparable to vspider in Lucene/Railo?
